metadata.title: CVE-2025-0825 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: cpp-httplib version v0.17.3 through v0.18.3 fails to filter CRLF characters("\r\n") when those are prefixed with a null byte. This enables attackersto exploit CRLF injection that could further lead to HTTP ResponseSplitting, XSS, and more.

criterions.comment: cpp-httplib package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
